Reason: The 'commitlog_total_space_in_mb' configuration is performance-sensitive. This is because the total space available for commit logs directly impacts the system's performance at the system level. The unusedCapacity() method performs calculations based on this configuration, which involves time-expensive operations such as multiplication and subtraction. A smaller total commit log space can lead to more frequent flush activities and increased disk I/O, impacting the overall performance of the system.
